Articles.Content:
Hi there folks.

I recently discovered KSP thanks to a cool youtube video and I have been hooked ever since.

Jeb has to be my favourite although our time together has been reduced now that we have crew rotation. When my 12 stage rocket is failing only 10 metres off the ground i know that while I may be displaying concerns Jebadiah will be there perfoming the motto 'Keep Calm and Carry On' to the best of his ability.

Looking forward to more adventures with all the Kermans and can\'t wait for future developments.
Welcome! Jeb is indeed a favourite of many people.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
